english.segment1: We were the dreamers, the boys on the wild frontier. The new believers, with nothing in the world to fear. We had discovered the treasure of the love and the grace of God. And it burned like a fire in our hearts and we would
english.segment2: Throw back our heads and run with a passion. Through the fields of forgiveness and grace. We carried the eternal flame. With an undying hope and a blazing conviction. Of a truth that would never fade. We were glowing in the dark. Children of a burning heart
